name: usagi21
text: The best lies are the ones told to children

name: heatbag
text: That is the best arguement for having children I have ever heard.

name: bixschmix
text: Also: Santa Claus.

name: spinynorman
text:
See Calvin's unnamed dad for details.

blue light special!

name: fosters
text: My favorite was the time he messed with Calvin's head about the different parts of a record moving at different speeds. That really freaked me out as a kid.

name: tekende
text: Dangit, I'm listening to a record right now and did not need to be reminded of that.

name: donnatron
text:
Lie Bot's lies build character!!

Which is especially essential in story arcs...

name: nessotron
text: More like best argument for talking to other people's children. And emotionally ruining them.

name: m3funkyb
text: A comment left by m3funkyb was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by envika, aargh, syrupykeyboard, morypcaina, mystkmanat, bixschmix, Direhaggis, yaegmenthor, philosophe)

name: evolume
text: A comment left by evolume was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Deusoma, envika, rhymesforkids, Darthemed)

name: songbirdspectre
text: LieBot is the best bastard.

name: i_love_kate
text: Liebot is the bestard.

name: ovenface
text: smooth portmanteau!

name: ovenface
text: mellifluous, even.

name: straw
text: Effervescent!

name: invidious
text: Liebot, you magnificent bestard, I read your book!

name: f1shst1ck
text: I wouldn't leave lie bot alone with my child

name: envika
text: FUCK!

name: molesticide
text: well said!

name: cinderfella
text: Did anyone else mentally add a DUHN DUHN DUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUHN at the end? Boy... I sure hope so, otherwise I might have to go back to the special room.

name: morypcaina
text:
I saw the alt text and went for "ca-me-ra-ca-me-ra" instead

but I think Drama is a good album, so what do I know

name: heccibiggs
text: Lie Bot from a face-on view is horrifying.

name: hellofditties
text: Why why oh why isn't this strip rated higher?

name: fineoakstructure
text: Yeah man, what gives?

name: snowman
text: this is the saddest thing

name: serf
text: I think phil is great dad material

name: cracklewater
text:
Phillipe gets extra leg-length to allow him to kneel, yet he remains the same height whether kneeling or standing.

Otters are freaky.

name: mikeronomicon
text: I think it's totally rad that his name is Lie-Bot, he lies all the time, yet everyone always believes him. Guess the joke wouldn't be that funny otherwise.

name: cproseedcakeksc
text: Yeah, that's one of my favourite things about Achewood. When I'm telling people about the strip, my description usually concludes with something like "...and his name is Lie Bot!"

name: tekende
text: How can a robot gasp

name: cproseedcakeksc
text: Interesting how Lie Bot sometimes uses the truth to tell more effective lies.
